name: Real Time Chat Application
desc: A real-time chat application that allows users to send and receive messages instantly. Features include live messaging, user authentication, and a clean chat interface for seamless communication..

name: Quiz App
desc: A responsive quiz application that enables users to test their knowledge through timed multiple-choice questions, instant result display, and score analysis. Built to provide an engaging and smooth user experience.

name: Weatherly Android
desc: Native android app built using Java, XML and Volley dependencies. Provides weather forecast.
